body.name: Logitech Brio 505 Full HD Webcam with Auto Light Correction, Auto-Framing, Show Mode, Dual Noise Reduction Mics, Privacy Shutter, Works with Microsoft Teams, Zoom, Google Meet
features: Trust the Market Leader: Logitech helps people engage with their work by equipping home and office space with tools for productivity and authenticity
Deploy with Confidence: Certified for Microsoft Teams, Zoom, Google Meet; works with Chromebook, Windows, macOS, ChromeOS and most popular video calling platforms
Plug-and-Play Solution: Advanced image quality, auto light correction and dual noise reduction mics work right out of the box so users look and sound natural
Enhanced Experience: Show physical items by tilting the webcam camera in Show Mode; Auto-Framing(1)(3) keeps the camera centered as users stand and move
Webcam with Privacy Shutter: An integrated, easy-to-use privacy shutter completely blocks the camera when users don’t wish to be seen
Security and Simple Management: Logitech Sync and Logi Tune(2) let you push firmware and software updates remotely to keep Logitech webcams safe and secure
Meet Sustainability goals: Brio 505 has a minimum of 59% post-consumer recycled (PCR) plastic, responsible packaging to meet FSC standards, and carbon-neutral certification
body.description: Brio 505 is a 1080p plug-and-play webcam from the leader in business webcams. Certified for use with the major video calling platforms, Brio 505 can be deployed with confidence to workstations and home offices. Features such as advanced light correction, auto-framing, noise-reducing mics, and Show Mode provide a flawless meeting experience for employees with little to no effort on their part. The innovative Show Mode offers a new, easy way to include physical items in video calls. With Logitech Sync, IT can easily and remotely manage firmware and software updates to ensure Brio 505 is always up to date.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 3.6 3.6 out of 5 stars 3 ratings 3.6 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: MADE FOR BUSINESS Brio 505 is compatible with most video conferencing platforms such as Microsoft Teams, Zoom, Google Meet.

Previous page WELL-LIT IN ANY LIGHT RightLight 4 automatically adjusts to any light so users look natural, even in darker environments. BE FULLY PRESENT Full HD 1080p resolution and AI-based image correction ensure everyone is seen clearly. LIFT YOUR VOICE Brio 505 elevates employees' voices by filtering out background noise. PROTECTS PRIVACY An integrated, easy-to-use privacy shutter completely blocks the camera when not in use. Next page 1 AUTO LIGHT CORRECTION 2 ADVANCED IMAGE QUALITY 3 NOISE-REDUCING MICS 4 PRIVACY SHUTTER

ENHANCED MEETING EXPERIENCE SHOW MODE With Show Mode, employees can include physical items in video calls by tilting the camera down to show sketches, work in progress, or other objects on their desktops. AUTO-FRAMING RightSight 4 auto-framing keeps the camera centered so employees can stand and move during meetings without leaving the frame. Download Logi Tune for free to enable advanced meeting experience.

SECURITY AND SIMPLE MANAGEMENT LOGITECH SYNC Configure Logitech video collaboration devices from one easy place, and deploy the latest firmware and software updates with Logitech Sync. Monitor rooms, devices, and peripherals from anywhere and resolve problems before they impact a meeting. LOGI TUNE Download the free Logi Tune desktop app for additional features that allow you to adjust the webcam to your preferences. Adjust color and image resolution. Take advantage of other features like automatic firmware updates.

BE EQUIPPED FOR HYBRID WORK Equip your employees with professional tools for hybrid work. Logitech solutions improve employee productivity and comfort, make meetings more equitable, and simplify device management for IT. CLEAR AUDIO, HOURS OF COMFORT Help employees hear clearly and sound natural in video meetings with Zone Vibe Wireless, a comfortable over-the-ear headset made for hybrid work. LEARN MORE PRO TOOLS FOR PRO WORK The MX Keys Mini Combo for Business offers precision, performance, style and upgraded security for people who need compact, quality tools. LEARN MORE

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Wasn’t worth the price
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to show sketches to my team on zoom but the quality was TERRIBLE. I tried quite a few lighting scenarios but just couldn’t reduce the graininess. The Apple built in cam was substantially better quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Poor Video Quality
reviews.reviewText: Using on an office display. Had a Logi Stream Cam which worked well until the cat though it was a toy. I thought this would be as good if not better... I was wrong. It scores points for simple, minimal packaging, also points for super easy install. But all those points as worthless because the video quality is terrible, grainy and blurry.
